title: Buzz.leagueoflegends.com error
body: I get this error the second before my game started and I went to it and it just did a search instead and it says it is usually for people who got suspended or banned. And I'm like Wtf? Uh I didn't do anything in my last game of past few games. So I restarted client and no message and I can still connect to chat(which it said some people can't) ' Tried to play a normal game instead of ranked and it worked. Soooo what is it?

replies.body: Wow, that sounds really weird! I'm not sure what error message you saw without hearing the full text of the message. If it happens again, please let me know what it says in its entirety so we can get to work on troubleshooting it together. ^.^

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ldIWN8wi,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-01-13T03:20:49.856+0000)
>
> Wow, that sounds really weird! I'm not sure what error message you saw without hearing the full text of the message. If it happens again, please let me know what it says in its entirety so we can get to work on troubleshooting it together. ^.^

Well played the rest of the day and no problem thankfully. I think it said we can't connect you and connect support or something
